description: Environmentally friendly. Comfortable. Lightweight. The Albula HS Hooded Jacket Men rain jacket is made from a 100% recycled polyester main material dyed using the environmentally friendly dope-dye method. PFC-free, lightweight, compressible. The Albula HS Hooded Jacket is easy to transport when not in use.
name: Mammut Albula HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
